creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: black, red and white tie dye; central black medallion surrounded by four similar smaller medallions on white--red looped designs at center and red edges; black border with red edging on each end and one red corner with wide gold stripe; gold braid at center between panels and at long sides, embellished with gold sequins
title: Head covering
